channel.title: AI Regulation on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in AI Regulation on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ChatGPT may soon require ID verification from adults, CEO says
item.description: Chatbot will “default to the under-18 experience” when age is uncertain after teen suicide lawsuit.

item.title: OpenAI and Microsoft sign preliminary deal to revise partnership terms
item.description: Companies work to finalize terms as OpenAI pursues for-profit restructuring.

item.title: AI vs. MAGA: Populists alarmed by Trump’s embrace of AI, Big Tech
item.description: AI “threatens the common man’s liberty," says GOP Sen. Josh Hawley.

item.title: OpenAI announces parental controls for ChatGPT after teen suicide lawsuit
item.description: Promised protections follow reports of vulnerable users misled in extended chats.

item.title: After teen suicide, OpenAI claims it is “helping people when they need it most”
item.description: ChatGPT allegedly provided suicide encouragement to teen after moderation safeguards failed.

item.title: OpenAI admits ChatGPT safeguards fail during extended conversations
item.description: ChatGPT allegedly provided suicide encouragement to teen after moderation safeguards failed.

item.title: With AI chatbots, Big Tech is moving fast and breaking people
item.description: Why AI chatbots validate grandiose fantasies about revolutionary discoveries that don’t exist.

item.title: States take the lead in AI regulation as federal government steers clear
item.description: All 50 states have introduced AI-related legislation this year.

item.title: White House unveils sweeping plan to “win” global AI race through deregulation
item.description: Trump’s “AI Action Plan” reverses regulations, sparks critical pushback.

item.title: AI therapy bots fuel delusions and give dangerous advice, Stanford study finds
item.description: Popular chatbots serve as poor replacements for human therapists, but study authors call for nuance.
